SourceString:
Welcome to the {Shop_Type}.
<select>
Buy
Sell
Leave
<select_end><break>
Come back anytime!\n<turn_end>
You're here to buy some.\nWhich one do you want?\n<break>
Would you like to buy something else?\n<break>
Oh, it looks like you don't\nhave enough money to buy that.\n<bw_break>
Well, that's a shame.\n<br_break>
Thank you very much!\n<br_break>

This is also
effective when used as a
tool in battle.
<bw_break>

{Item_Selected_Name}.
{Item_Costs} gold,
would you like to buy this?
<yesno><break>

No one seems to be able to
equip the {Item_Selected_Name}.
Would you like to put it in the bag?
<yesno><break>
Would you like to\nequip {Item_Selected_Name} now?\n<yesno><break>
Then I'll\nput it in my bag.\n<bw_break>
Who's going to\nequip {Item_Selected_Name}?\n<break>

Oh, it looks like {Character_Selected_Name} can't
equip
{Item_Selected_Name}.
<bw_break>

Oh, looks like {Character_Selected_Name} is
equipped with
{Item_Selected_Name}.
<bw_break>
{Character_Selected_Name} is going to equip it?\n<yesno><break>
Then put {Item_Selected_Name} in\nbag?\n<yesno><break>

Then I'll
put it in my bag.
Thank you very much!
<bw_break>

Then I'll
keep what I was looking for in my storage bag.
Thank you very much!
<bw_break>
Huh? It looks like you\ndon't have anything to sell.\n<bw_break>

What can you sell me?
<select>
Consumables
Equipment
<select_end><break>
Which one would you sell me?\n<break>
Anything else you want to sell?\n<break>
How many would you sell?\n<break>
What would you sell me?\n<break>
Anything else you want to sell?\n<break>

Oh? That's hard to come by
and it's precious, but
are you sure you want to sell it?
<yesno2><break>
How many would you sell?\n<break>

Huh? It looks like you have one
equipped right now.
Are you sure you want to sell it?
<yesno2><break>
Oh...\nI'm afraid we can't buy that.\n<bw_break>
Well, that's a shame.\n<br_break>
You have {Item_Selected_Quantity} of {Item_Selected_Name}.\nWould you like to sell for {Item_Costs} gold?\n<yesno><break>
Oh no.\nYou seem to have a lot of money.\n<br_break>
Put it in or buy something\nand save some money and come back again.\n<bw_break>
Hello thank you!\n<bw_break>
{Item_Selected_Name}.\nHow many would you like to buy?\n<break>

{Item_Selected_Quantity} of {Item_Selected_Name}.
Total is {Item_Costs} Gold, but
Would you like to buy this?
<yesno><break>

{Item_Selected_Name} is
{Item_Costs} gold.
It's a two-handed item, would you like to buy it?
<yesno><break>

{Character_Selected_Name} is dual-wielding.
Then you should
equip your dominant hand with a good weapon.
<br_break>

Would you like to change your weapon and
equip the {Item_Selected_Name} you just bought
in your dominant hand?
<yesno2><break>
So you want to\nequip your non-dominant hand?\n<yesno2><break>

{Character_Selected_Name} is dual wielding.
Would you like to
equip the {Item_Selected_Name} you just bought?
<yesno2><break>

Do you need anything else?
<select>
Buy
Sell
Leave
<select_end><break>

crafting level {Level_Recipe} or higher, but
ok?
<yesno><break>
That item is out of stock.\nSorry.\n<br_break>
Oh my gosh. It looks like you can't have\nmore {item_Selected_Name}.\n<br_break>
There's a colored one\ndo you really want to sell it? <yesno2><break>
Which items would you like to sell?\n(and {Item_Selected_Quantity} more) <break>
Do you want to stop selling\ncolored {Item_Selected_Name}?<yesno><break>
Are you going to\nsell {Item_Selected_Name}?<yesno><break>
Do you want me to sell\n{Item_Selected_Quantity} of\n{Item_Selected_Name} together with the ones you selected? <yesno2><break>
Hey customer\nit looks like you're using that item for your outfit.<br_break>
Hey customer\nit looks like you've\nincluded the one you're using in your outfit.<br_break>
I need to get it again\nto register again, but can I sell it?\n*My code will not be deleted. <yesno2><break>

Oh? Dear customer,
you can't equip your armor. You seem to be playing for a while.
Are you still going to buy it?
<yesno><break>

Hey dear customer, it looks like you've
made a lot of purchases.
I'll give you a gift voucher for your service.
<br_break>
Hey, it looks like you can't\nfit any more in the bag\n<br_break>

{Character_Selected_Name} has two accessories equipped.
Would you like to equip the {Item_Selected_Name} you just bought to
Accessory 1?
<yesno2><break>
So you want to equip {Item_Selected_Name} to\nAccessory 2?\n<yesno2><break>
